div.p: We thank two anonymous reviewers for valuable comments about the manuscript. Manolo Carrión provided technical help with the seeds. Juan Miguel Arroyo and Cristina Rigueiro performed laboratory work. Logistic support was provided by both the Laboratorio de Ecología Molecular (LEM-EBD) and the Laboratorio de Sistemas de Información Geográfica y Teledetección (LAST-EBD). The Consejería de Medio Ambiente (Junta de Andalucía) gave us permission to carry out field work in Parque Natural de las Sierras de Cazorla, Segura y Las Villas.
